response.original_title: ワイルド式日本人妻の寝取り方-実写版- WANZ初コミックコラボ＆黒人解禁　売上５万部！爆乳肉妻が犯され堕ちた黒人NTRを実写化！
response.overview: Kaede, a full-time housewife, was living a frustrated life due to a cold relationship with her husband who works for a major company. However, one day, her husband brings home a foreign student named Michael, and Kaede's life changes completely. On the third day of her homestay, Kaede is raped by Michael. The intense beast fuck, her first orgasm, and his bottomless sexual desire to seek again and again fulfilled Kaede's desires... Her body and mind were drowned in the insatiable penis that whispered love and crushed her uterus...
response.title: How to Sleep with Japanese wife. A black man's NTR story, where a busty wife is raped and falls into depravity.
